settings.banner_heading: A lifetime of healthy walking starts here
settings.banner_sub_heading: From day one, our mission has been to put the best-fitting shoes on the feet of Australian children at family-friendly prices. Over 30 years on, we remain true to this mission. Only now we deliver it with greater industry knowledge, a larger range of shoes, and even better value from any one of our 80+ locations across Australia, including our Myer Concession stores.

settings.title: Family Business With Family Values
settings.description: Shoes & Sox remains family-owned with the 2nd generation of family members now joining the team of over 200 people, including a number of long-standing members who have come to form part of the Shoes & Sox family over these many years. This helps us operate with both contemporary corporate management processes guided by traditional family business values. Over the years we have partnered with charity partnerships like Aspect to to offer private fitting appointments before or after hours or during quieter times for children who would benefit from a quiet, calm environment when purchasing shoes. Camp Quality to support kids impacted by cancer every opportunity to thrive and recently have partnered with TreadLightly a national recycling program that brings new life to preloved footwear. TreadLightly saves your preloved shoes by re-purposing them into flooring and mats used in playgrounds and gyms in Australia.

settings.title: A Fabulous Growth Story
settings.description: Shoes & Sox filled a specific need for professionally fitted children’s shoes when it opened its first store in 1987 at Westfield Chatswood. Word-of-mouth spread fast (even pre-social media days) and our customer base grew quickly as people everywhere wanted the best for their kid’s feet.More stores opened, and then in 1996, Shoes & Sox opened its first Melbourne store in the Malvern Central Shopping Centre. This meant taking our operations to a new level if we were to guarantee a consistent approach and level of professional fitting no matter which store you visited.We then committed to opening new stores in areas that were under-serviced for professionally fitted children’s shoes. Our range continued to develop and our buying power improved with scale, allowing us to pass on even better value to our customers. In 2022, we celebrated our 44th store opening at Westfield Westfield North Lakes in Queensland. In 2016, we partnered with Myer to launch Shoes & Sox Concession Stores in over 40 Myer stores across Australia. Today, we continue to deliver on that original mission to provide professionally fitted children’s shoes from around the world at great prices for Australian families.

settings.title: Range of Leading Brands
settings.description: We stock possibly the largest range of children’s shoes in Australia. As Australia’s No.1 children’s retailer for Clarks, Shoes & Sox is the place to go for school, sports and fashion shoes. You’ll also find many other Australian brands including Harrison, Walnut Melbourne, Old Soles and Roc. International brands include Crocs, Skechers, Converse and Bobux, plus all the major sports brands including Asics, Nike, New Balance and Adidas.

settings.title: Now available online
settings.description: In 2013, we created our 24th outlet, the Shoes & Sox online store, to service all those families who don’t live within easy proximity to a Shoes & Sox store. Now everyone can have access to great kid’s shoes and have them delivered to their door – no matter where they live in Australia.  Our story is about helping as many Australian families as possible to access our knowledge, range and value, and ensure their kids get off to a healthy start in life too, with correctly fitting shoes.

settings.title: 100% Perfect fit guaranteed
settings.description: With a range of shoes to choose from, and with half sizes and widths available, we are confident that you will love your new shoes. We stand behind our in-store fit service and it’s our mission to get it right, every time. If you feel like you haven’t received 100% the perfect fit, please head back in store for a complimentary fit check within one month of your purchase.

settings.text:
.After the initial 3 months of training, we ensure an experienced member of the Fit Squad is always overseeing our new fitters for 6 months, to guarantee the right fit is walking out of the door.This ensures a professional Fit Squad member, who understands the anatomy of a child’s growing foot, is in-store to match your child’s unique feet to the latest styles from around the world.With a range of shoes to choose from, and with half sizes and widths available, we are confident that you will love your new shoes. We stand behind our in-store fit service and it’s our mission to get it right, every time. If you feel like you haven’t received 100% the perfect fit, please head back in store for a complimentary fit check within one month of your purchase.Buying online? We have a range of services to ensure you receive the same Fit Squad approved service, online. You can also be confident in the fit of your child’s shoes with refunds on all unworn full price items and credit notes on all unworn sale items.

When you receive your online order, we recommend having your child try their new shoes on soft or carpeted floors. Ask them to walk around the room and check that their feet are not slipping and that the shoe is fitting securely through the ankle. Feel the side of the shoes and make sure the feet are not pressing too tightly. Lastly, ensure there is a thumb space of room at the front of the shoe to allow space for growing. If they’re not 100% right, get in touch with us here to arrange your return. Please note, shoes must be unworn and in new condition to be eligible for a return.
